subject: Basketball (College)
Football (College)
College Athletics
Colleges and Universities
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Rutgers University’s board has approved a plan to build a multiuse men’s and women’s basketball facility and give the university’s football team exclusive use of a refurbished Hale Center.
snippet: Rutgers University’s board has approved a plan to build a multiuse men’s and women’s basketball facility and give the university’s football team exclusive use of a refurbished Hale Center.
